Name: Jump to CSS var declaration
Description: Can I jump to the declaration where the CSS variable is defined?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Name: Jump to CSS var declaration
Chrome.Notes: 1. In **Styles** pane, hover the variable name to see the actual value in the tooltip. Click the link to jump to the section where the variable is defined.

Edge.Name: Jump to CSS var declaration
Edge.Notes: 1. In **Styles** pane, hover the variable name to see the actual value in the tooltip. Click the link to jump to the section where the variable is defined.
